    Content

    content.Rmd

    Learning Compendia

    For each topic, we provide videos, online quizzes, and small programming exercises in R. They are combined in a learning compendium. Links to the individual videos and slides can be found below.

    • ML Basics
    • Supervised Regression
    • Supervised Classification (coming soon)
    • Evaluation
    • Trees
    • Random Forests
    • Tuning (coming soon)

    Code Demos

    You can run the code snippets in the demos on your local machine. If you want to render the Rmd files to PDF, you need the accompanying style files.
